Title: 4C
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Melissa Scrivner-Love, Greg Plageman, Sean Hennen (executive story editor), Nic Van Zeebroeck (story editor), Michael Sopczynski (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker, Sarah Shahi
Plot: Reese, still despondent over Carter's death, boards a flight to Europe and gets a cryptic message on a cellphone about a passenger who is supposed to be just a low level programmer, but is the target of a drug cartel and the Mossad.
